mapper.sql: SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM jr_purchase_requisition pr WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT pr.id, pr.purchase_requisition_date purchaseRequisitionDate, pr.odd_numbers oddNumbers, d.DEPT_NAME departmentName, prs.apply_code applyCode, prs.apply_name applyName, prs.apply_specifications applySpecifications, prs.apply_quality applyQuality, prs.apply_brand applyBrand, prs.apply_company applyCompany, prs.apply_quantity applyQuantity, prs.delivery_date deliveryDate, prs.apply_remarks applyRemarks, prs.apply_subclass applySubclass, prs.apply_category applyCategory, pr.apply_preparer applyPreparer, pr.apply_preparation_date applyPreparationDate FROM jr_purchase_requisition pr LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON ( pr.department_id = d.dept_id ) LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_requisition_schedule prs ON ( pr.odd_numbers = prs.odd_numbers ) WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.select: SELECT pr.id, pr.apply_state applyState, pr.odd_numbers oddNumbers, pr.purchase_requisition_date purchaseRequisitionDate, pr.department_id departmentId, pr.apply_preparer applyPreparer, pr.apply_preparation_date applyPreparationDate FROM jr_purchase_requisition pr WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY pr.apply_preparation_date ORDER BY pr.apply_preparation_date DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT prs.odd_numbers oddNumbers, prs.apply_code applyCode, prs.apply_name applyName, prs.apply_specifications applySpecifications, prs.apply_quality applyQuality, prs.apply_brand applyBrand, prs.apply_company applyCompany, prs.apply_quantity applyQuantity, prs.delivery_date deliveryDate, prs.apply_remarks applyRemarks FROM jr_purchase_requisition_schedule prs WHERE prs.odd_numbers = #{oddNumbers}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_purchase_requisition_schedule ( odd_numbers, apply_code, apply_name,apply_specifications,apply_quality,apply_brand,apply_company ,apply_quantity, delivery_date,apply_remarks,apply_subclass,apply_category,apply_cancel) VALUES (#{oddNumbers}, #{applyCode}, #{applyName}, #{applySpecifications}, #{applyQuality}, #{applyBrand}, #{applyCompany}, #{applyQuantity}, #{deliveryDate}, #{applyRemarks}, #{applySubclass}, #{applyCategory}, #{applyCancel} )
mapper.select: SELECT pr.id, pr.apply_state applyState, pr.odd_numbers oddNumbers, pr.purchase_requisition_date purchaseRequisitionDate, pr.department_id departmentId, pr.apply_preparer applyPreparer, pr.apply_preparation_date applyPreparationDate FROM jr_purchase_requisition pr WHERE pr.id = #{id}

SELECT prs.odd_numbers oddNumbers, prs.apply_code applyCode, prs.apply_name applyName, prs.apply_specifications applySpecifications, prs.apply_quality applyQuality, prs.apply_brand applyBrand, prs.apply_company applyCompany, prs.apply_quantity applyQuantity, prs.delivery_date deliveryDate, prs.apply_remarks applyRemarks FROM jr_purchase_requisition_schedule prs WHERE prs.odd_numbers = #{oddNumbers}
